title: Patch 5.14 Error
body:
Logged on around 4:35pm to play LoL, then the update was well updating, its now 8.21pm and the patch is at 99% and staying there.
Please Fix.

replies.body:
I too began updating tonight... started around 5:30pm NZST and I've had it stop at Step 2/2 at 0kbps for ages. I tried a repair, force a re-patch, a full re-install but on all attempts, it stops at 33%.

Anyone else having an issue?
I also have that same issue, tried everything, re-installing, did the re-patch method etc and nothing works. Hopefully there's a fix for this

Finally I fixed mine! This is for Windows users.

This is what I did:

1. Disable UAC (http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/turn-user-account-control-on-off#1TC=windows-7) 
2. Restart computer
3. Begin re-patching.


The issue was because LoL didn't have permission to patch files.
u have a windows? most people have macs that are suffering the problem?
Sorry - I don't use a Mac so I'm not too sure. However due to the large patch it requires admin privileges so I would assume it's the same. Just not sure how to do it for mac computers.
